description: This file initializes an Agent with a MistralChat model and demonstrates how to generate and print a response to a prompt.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a language model, capable of running prompts and printing responses.

classes.name: MistralChat
classes.description: A model class representing the Mistral chat model used for generating responses.

methods.name: Agent()
methods.description: Constructor for creating an Agent instance with specified model and options.

methods.name: agent.run()
methods.description: Method to run a prompt through the agent, optionally streaming responses.

methods.name: agent.print_response()
methods.description: Method to generate and print a response to a prompt.
